name: Spider Boss
description:
Hi !

Here is a game made for French Construct Jam #6 in a week-end.

Story

You are a boss in a MMOPRG  and you have to fight against the endless flow of players who are here to take your head.

At each death, you can use the souls of the players you've killed to become stronger.

How to play

Controls are displayed in the game.

The game was designed to play with a controller, but you can play it with a Qwerty keyboard.

WASD or RStick to move

E or A to attack

Q or B to use special attack.

Credits :

Made with Unity

Made by Mathieu Bouchonnet and Justine Duluye
